variant.p: This IFRS does not apply to share‑based payment transactions in which the entity receives or acquires goods or services under a contract within the scope of paragraphs 8–10 of IAS 32 Financial Instruments: Presentation (as revised in 2003) or paragraphs 2.4–2.7 of IFRS 9 Financial Instruments.
